PRODUCT DESCRIPTION / USP:
- Simply pinch the stopper release and pull the stopper set out.                           
- Easy to dispense with pour lever. Simply press the lever and tilt the vacuum carafe when dispensing water.                             
- Wide mouth design-with 50mm mouth width, large ice cubes can be put into the pot for your cold beverages.                          
- Made of stainless steel.
- Vacuum insulated keep beverages hot or cold longer.
HEAT / COLD RETENTION:
- Hot Retention (10HRS) : Above 67° C 
- Cold Retention (10HRS) : Below 10° C
